extension_Name.description: The title of the extension, displayed in the Chrome Web Store.

extension_Description.message: Enables installation and semi-automatic updating for extensions from the Chrome Web Store (or elsewhere) on Chromium based browsers.
extension_Description.description: The description of the extension, displayed in the Chrome Web Store.

options_autoUpdateTooltip.message: Click the Chromium Web Store badge to perform a manual check

options_updateWebstore.message: Check for updates to Chrome Web Store extensions

options_updateWebstoreTooltip.message: Will contact Google to check for updates

options_updateNonWebstore.message: Check for updates to non-Chrome Web Store extensions

options_updateNonWebstoreTooltip.message: Only works if extension supports auto-updating

options_neverCheckTooltip.message: Never check for updates to this extension

options_updateDelay.description: delayInMinutes will be a field that can be edited by the user

options_manuallyInstallTooltip.message: Avoid the 'CRX_REQUIRED_PROOF_MISSING' restriction of Chrome to third-party extensions source

options_importExportDescription.message: Save the text here to a file to export. To import paste that text here and press $installButton$
options_importExportDescription.description: installButton is the text on the button, defined in options_importExportInstallAllButton

popup_allUpToDate.message: All extensions are up to date!

popup_updateFailed.description: extName will be the name of the extension that failed to update.

popup_removedExtensions.message: The following extensions have been removed from the Chrome Web Store
popup_removedExtensions.description: Will be shown above list of removed extensions.

popup_removedExtensionsTooltip.message: These may have been removed due to a violation of the Terms of Service.

notify_manuallyInstall_message.message:
1. enable developer mode
2. drag .crx into page
